snippet.title: Jelly Belly: Ballistic Beans - PlayStation 2 Gameplay
snippet.description:
A fast-paced arcade style game of skill, Jelly Belly Ballistic Beans! combines simple but highly addictive gameplay with a world-recognized license to provide a gaming experience that will appeal to casual players as well as seasoned veterans. Try your hand at hundreds of puzzles across 8 different themes. Simple to pick up, but impossible to put down!

The main objective is to get the required number of Jelly Belly Beans into the matching cups while scoring points, using power-ups, and earning bonuses along the way. Players use the bean launcher to propel the beans through intricate puzzle patterns. Exploding beans, rocket beans, and extra beans are just some of the power-ups to help players beat the puzzle quickly to score medals.

Developed by Blue Monkey Studios
Published by ZOO Digital Publishing
Also released on Nintendo DS and Wii

#retrogames #retrogaming #jellybelly #jellybellyballisticbeans #jellybeans #zoodigitalpublishing #ps2 #playstation #playstation2 

FUN FACT: While this was the first (and only) advergame for Jelly Belly, it wasn't the brand's first rodeo in video games. In fact, they even partnered up with Psygnosis and Clockwork Games to add Jelly Belly themed levels into 3D Lemmings. I kid you not!
